Poems, &c. written upon several occasions, and to several persons by Edmond Waller. Poems. Selections Waller, Edmund, 1606-1687.
The fifth edition, with several additions never before printed.
[7], 301, [5] p. : port.
Printed for H. Herringman, and are to be sold by J. Knight and F. Saunder ..., [London] : 1686.
"The table" [i.e. index]: p. [1]-[5] at end. "Fifth [i.e. eighth] edition." Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
